title: Sony RMVLZ620 Universal Remote Control (Black)
description: The RM-VLZ620 provides centralized control of all of your Audio Video devices, saving the trouble of operating other A/V devices with different remote controls. To use with non-Sony A/V devices, or Sony devices that are not preset at the factory , you need to set the manufacturer’s code for each device to any of the eight Device Select buttons. You can centralize control of all of your Sony devices and can also control non-Sony devices. You can teach the RM-VLZ620 new functions and perform a consecutive procedure by simply pressing one button.
